user_request: View the shopping cart on amazon. Search for razer nari on amazon, select the first entry, and add it to the cart.
screen_desc: The screenshot shows an Android home screen with a pink gradient wallpaper. The top displays the date, time (9:52), weather (7°C, clear night), and status icons for battery, Wi-Fi, and notifications. The bottom has a row of frequently used apps: YouTube, Messages, Gmail, Chrome, and Google Photos. A Google search bar with Assistant integration is positioned above the navigation buttons. The layout is minimalistic, with no widgets or additional icons on the home screen.
